entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • FileSystemWatcher_InternalBufferSize_SynchronizingObject test failed in CI #103495
  • GC/Regressions/v2.0-beta2/452950 failed in CI #103494
  • Linux Arm64 Release build cannot unwind the `MethodTable::GetNativeSize` function #103489
  • [release/6.0-staging] Ensure the single-job-per-target-based official build produces all the correct assets #103485
    6.0.x
  • System.Net.Quic.Tests.MsQuicTests failure on CI #103482
  • System.Formats.Nrbf lacks a package readme #103481
    9.0.0
  • Crash when disposing an EventListener during shutdown #103480
  • BinaryFormatTests.FormatterTests.BinaryFormatterTests.ValidateAgainstBlobs test failure on CI #103478
  • Optimization removes necessary code #103477
  • [mobile] Overview of mobile related CI failures #103472
    9.0.0
  • Cryptographic cryptoTransform.TransformFinalBlock() Throws Exception "Padding is invalid and cannot be removed" when data is passed in chunks #103470
  • Add a DirectoryPath property to DirectoryNotFoundException to be consistent with FileNotFoundException #103468
  • SslStream Custom Algorithm Support #103466
    Future
  • [RISC-V] Re-enable WriteXorExecute on riscv64 architecture. #103465
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Create and convenience APIs for System.Numerics types #103464
    9.0.0
  • NegotiateAuthentication.ComputeIntegrityCheck on Windows sets an invalid QOP #103461
    Future
  • TimeProviderTests.TestProviderTimer failed in CI #103459
  • Test failure: System.IO.Tests.File_GetSetTimes_SafeFileHandle_Pathless.WritingShouldUpdateWriteTime_After_SetLastAccessTime #103457
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Revert unintentional nullability changes and fix inconsistencies in StringContent ctrs #83423
    9.0.0
  • Race in Socket.BeginSendTo #30804
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add missing BigMul overload for uint x uint -> ulong #98346
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add File.WriteAllBytes taking ReadOnlySpan<byte> #99823
    9.0.0
  • [7.0] Test failure in Rsa.Tests.EncryptDecrypt_AllocatingSpan.Decrypt_Pkcs1_ErrorsForInvalidPadding #99652
  • [Mono] Build fails with libcdacreader.so missing from manifest #103486
  • LSRA: Add support to track more than 64 registers #99658
    9.0.0
  • BinaryFormatter PayloadReader API #102014
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add a generic OrderedDictionary class #24826
    9.0.0
  • Referencing assemblies produced by PersistedAssemblyBuilder generates a System.Private.CoreLib compiler error #103357
  • Mono is unable to find assemblies named with some international characters #103276
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Consolidate <NativeAotSupported definitions (#103273)" #103497
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Extend SearchValues<string> use in Regex to NonBacktracking #103496
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix Array.Initialize for big MD arrays #103493
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Consider block weights instead of `BBF_RUN_RARELY` flag in `fgMoveColdBlocks` #103492
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add a line stating that debugger scenario is not yet supported #103491
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • [PERF] Update the artifact path for the maui benchmarks app #103483
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Clone for IncrementalHash and KMAC #103479
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Fix the flakiness of new BinaryFormatter tests #103476
    area-System.Resources, binary-serialization, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Fix assembly name parser to accommodate non-ASCII UTF8 strings #103475
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.x
  • mark all BinaryFormatter-related tests as conditional #103471
    needs-area-label, binary-serialization
  • [LoongArch64] Implement 'JIT_GetDynamicNonGCStaticBase_SingleAppDomain', 'JIT_GetDynamicGCStaticBase_SingleAppDomain' after PR#99183. #103467
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Make it possible for featuredefault substitutions to only apply at publish time #103463
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Expose various new Create and conversion APIs for the Vector types #103462
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add Span.StartsWith(T) and EndsWith(T) #103458
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Fix linux arm64 release build #103490
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Mark StringContent mediaType parameters as nullable #103442
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Expose the BigMul APIs publicly #103455
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add File.Append/WriteAllText/Bytes{Async} overloads for span/memory #103308
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Exclude cdacreader from mono packs #103488
    area-Setup, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #103260
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • remove use of a term flagged by tooling #103487
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Handle more than 64 registers - The finale #103387
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: gathervector extends #103370
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Revert #102862 to unblock the official build #103484
    Servicing-approved, blocking-official-build, area-Infrastructure
  • Make System.Formats.Nrbf public #103232
    area-System.Security, binary-serialization
  • [RISC-V] Disable EnableWriteXorExecute by default on riscv64 architectue #103408
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Do not set UseNativeAotForComponents for arm32 MUSL #103469
    needs-area-label
  • clrinterp: Add missing must-expand intrinsics #103326
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add OrderedDictionary #103309
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use ThrowHelper in Queue<T> #103424
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Set UseNativeAotForComponents to false on bionic #103454
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Point to DMI.Create from RUC message on StackFrame.GetMethod #103400
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fold identical method bodies in the compiler #101969
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Move the thread alloc context off of Thread in CoreCLR #103055
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Arm64/SVE: Implement ConvertToInt32 and ConvertToUInt32 for double #103436
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Move src/native libraries that are shared between runtime builds to be targets-driven #103184
    EventPipe, area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2474449 #103348
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Implement ARM32 atomic intrinsics #97792
    arch-arm32, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Return type from exact method context for call returns #100041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface.GetThreadData #103324
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Move the working BinaryFormatter implementation to a NuGet package #103255
    area-System.Runtime, binary-serialization, 9.0.0
  • Optimize casts from constant byrefs #99130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove the OCSP nonce #103446
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • JIT: Move targets of hot jumps to create fallthrough post-RPO layout #102927
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Backport fix for MethodImpl removal when interfaceImpl is removed #103432
    Servicing-consider, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.x
  • [Android] Allow using installed certificates for client authentication in SslStream #103337
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • Consolidate LocateNativeCompiler target #103375
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • update proxy setting on registry changes #103364
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Add ILLink option to preserve symbol paths #103295
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [cdac] start of Metadata contract; implement GetMethodTableData SOS method #103444
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Validate generic constraints in ILLink tests #103452
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • match IPv4MappedToIPv6 address in IPv4 networks #103381
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Add JsonSchemaExporter. #103322
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [ILASM] Added `/DET` flag for deterministic compilations #85344
    area-ILTools-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fixed creating generic type with abstract type when it is has a default constractor constrant #101963
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix VS issue with unhandled exception on secondary threads #103425
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix handling SECBUFFER_EXTRA with renegotiation after handshake. #103419
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Make all of the trimmer aware of recursive interfaces #103317
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Support overriding MsQuic.dll in the application directory on Windows. #103351
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add AbsoluteCompare* APIs #102611
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [HTTP/3] Wrap Cancelled Request with OCE instead of QuicException #103081
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Cleanup some handling around Avx10v1 #103241
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Obsolete ServicePointManager 🎉 #103456
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Tar: support GNU numeric format. #101172
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Process.Linux: handle when /proc and the process pid namespace don't match. #100076
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Fix 97272 #99818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete some unused cmake defines #103441
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Move hardcoded `_BoolPropertiesThatTriggerRelinking` to `wasm-props.json` included in the runtime pack #103422
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Fix debugger support #98494
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] Bundle assets inside of wasm file #103160
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • [LoongArch64] change instructions in IMAGE_REL_LOONGARCH64_PC & fix genCodeForJumpCompare #103399
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Fix DynamicInvokeMethodThunk hash code collisions #103274
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Don't report dependency on canonical forms just because there's GVMs #103331
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [HybridGlobalization] Pass non-breaking space / narrow non-breaking space characters #103226
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-browser
  • Use LTO for linux as well #103058
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Stack allocate unescaped boxes #103361
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Merge 1ES templates #103366
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix zombie LDAP results retriever thread #102526
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Workload sets in VS #41607
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: feed download failed #41590
  • dotnet test cache/result output cache #41589
  • [NETSDKE2E][ARM64][intermittent]Get "Fatal error. System.AccessViolationException: Attempted to read or write protected memory. This is often an indication that other memory is corrupt." When running the command quickly. #41588

Closed

  • Different build output for classic projects: NuGet packages vs project reference. Is this on purpose? #2203
    Backlog
  • PreserveCompilationContext should not depend on reference assemblies installed in Program Files #2054
    Backlog
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: The "RestoreTask" task returned false but did not log an error #41477
  • [NETSDKE2E][Loc]The string "Configured to use loose manifests when installing new manifests." is not localized in dotnet --info output on Loc OS. #41180
    9.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Mono Stage 2 Leg to VMR SB #41606
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] Trusted roots: 2024-06 CTL #41605
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.3xx] Trusted roots: 2024-06 CTL #41604
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Trusted roots: 2024-06 CTL #41603
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Trusted roots: 2024-06 CTL #41602
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown

Merged

  • [release/8.0.4xx] Fix frameworks option forwarding for 'dotnet nuget why' #41586
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix frameworks option forwarding for 'dotnet nuget why' #41585
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Containers: insecure registries: allow https (ignore cert errors), and accept config from envvar. #41506
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Trusted roots: 2024-06 CTL #41565
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Aspire 8.0 workload in the 9.0 SDK #41562
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Implement dotnet test help option #41142
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-14
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Extending patterns to "as" #8210

PullRequests

  • Clarify first-class Span speclet #8215

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Long-running IAsyncEnumerable<T> leaks the last seen enumerated value. #74013
  • It looks like PEEventSymbol's constructor assumes that we always have both accessors. #74011
  • Test Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.LanguageServer.UnitTests.DocumentChanges.DocumentChangesTests.FindReferencesInChangingDocument(mutatingLspWorkspace: False) failed in CI #74009
  • Link in docs/contributing/README.md should work. #74005

Closed

  • A potential bug in custom string interpolation constructor resolving for `ref` parameters #73690
    17.11
  • Unexpected SemanticModel responses related to ValueTuples when it involves a nullable element #73052
    Backlog
  • Permit Where to do nullability checks #74008
  • Overridden != and == do not affect nullability #74010
  • Generic parameter constrained to implement true, false, &, |, operators in separate interfaces still generates CS0217 or CS0218 error #74000
  • WINDOWS Preprocessor not hiding CA1416 with target framework net8.0-windows #74004

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix flakiness in LSP references tests due to non-deterministic ordering #74014
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable end-to-end binding and emit for basic scenarios involving instance extension members. #74012
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Support navigating to an interceptor location when on an intercepted method call. #74006
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ignore user-defined Span conversions #74002
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • WIP run iterations to test in CI #73997
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix the duplicate glyphs in Inheritance margin #73996
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure source generated documents are up-to-date before analyzing EnC changes #73989
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74007
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix project configuration telemetry for legacy csproj projects #73995
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #73999
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Support goto-def taking you from an interceptor method to the location being intercepted. #73992
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.10 #73998
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Consider extension receiver conversion when reducing #73762
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Prefer implicit span conversions #73765
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.10 #73954
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.8 #73993
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Updated

  • Parse `field` and `value` as contextual keywords #73947
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Include wrapping options in editorconfig formatting options #73938
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Check duplicate interfaces only for metadata #73797
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Emit extension marker method as public #73994
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2474078 #73982
    auto-merge
  • Use correct get / set inside ref safety analysis #73842
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quarantine RunAsync_CanFilterHealthChecks #56245
  • Validate local development workflows in CI #56237
  • .Net 9 Blazor compilation bug #56236
  • Missing required value for constructor parameter #56234
  • `DistributedSession` tries to refresh non-existent keys #56233
  • Published size regression: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #56231
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #56230
  • Perf regression: json_middleware, mapaction #56229
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #56228
  • Incorrect Logging Level for JSON Format Errors in POST Requests #56227

Closed

  • Build in AuthenticationStateProvider breaks after trimming #56207
    9.0-preview7
  • asp-append-version only works for StaticFiles in wwwroot #56224
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo #56243
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #56242
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #56241
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #56240
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #56239
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #56238
  • Properties with the `[Required]` attribute should be required in the generated OpenAPI document #56212
    9.0-preview6
  • [9.0-preview.4] OpenAPI response does get served if a static file with the same path exists as a file #55833
  • User Login Session could not maintain in Blazor Client Server Interactive Auto render mode. #56203
  • Properties with the [DefaultValue] attribute should have a default value in the generated OpenAPI document #56215
    9.0-preview6

PullRequests

Created

  • Quarantine RunAsync_CanFilterHealthChecks #56246
    area-healthchecks
  • Warn when [Authorize] is overridden by [AllowAnymous] from "farther" away #56244
    area-infrastructure
  • Use Convert.ToHexStringLower() #56235
    community-contribution, area-security
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a7f443b` to `1d17ea1` #56232
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Add codefixer and completion provider to install OpenAPI package from extension methods #55963
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview6
  • Add support for processing RequiredAttribute on OpenApi schemas #56225
    area-mvc, area-minimal, 9.0-preview6
  • Add support for processing DefaultValueAttribute in OpenApi schemas #56219
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview6

Updated

  • [Blazor] Consume fingerprinted assets in MVC and Blazor #56045
    area-blazor
  • Update C# code for #29448 #56086
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Add support for reference-based schemas in OpenAPI document #56175
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Add logging to MVC tests #55592
    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-14
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Understanding metrics and memory usage of a .net app (seem mostly consume by cache and fragmentation) #4697
    9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Border on iOS redraws with 1 frame lag, creating flashes of (1) square corners on redraws, and (2) old background color before new color update #23070
  • Cannot publish iOS from Windows after connecting to Mac #23069
  • Grouped CollectionView fires IndexOutOfBoundsException from MauiRecyclerView after second collapse/expand #23068
  • My mac doesnt show up #23067
  • Cannot reference Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.NewtonsoftJson version 8.0.6 in net8.0-ios #23066
  • MAUI App Scaling Issue on Windows #23065
  • UITests broken for net9 #23064
    9.0-preview6
  • Maui Essentials Permissions CheckStatusAsync<LocationWhenInUse> Or CheckStatusAsync<LocationAlways> returns Denied instead of restricted #23060
  • Add Maui 8.0.60 to list of Versions (etc) #23059
  • Image Loaded event not firing in 8.0.60 version which is used to fire in 8.0.40 and earlier versions. Selected 8.0.40 I am unable to see 8.0.60 #23058
    .NET 8 SR7
  • [Windows] App based on FlyoutPage uses incorrect title bar colours when system is set to Dark theme and app set to Light theme - illegible content #23057
    .NET 8 SR8
  • Layouts which work fine in iOS are blank in Android, but suddenly work if "touched" via hot reload. #23056
  • Got error XA0129: Error deploying 'files/.__override__/System.Data.Common.dll'. #23055
  • Display the text from the beginning part when the Entry control loses focus #23054
  • PanGestureRecognizer not working for iOS #23053
  • View cell Tapgesture not working for MAUI8.0 #23051
  • Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Element: Warning: The RealParent on Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Shapes.RoundRectangle has been Garbage Collected. This should never happen. Please log a bug: https://github.com/dotnet/maui #23050
  • [Android] Crash on startup after enabling LLVM #23048

Closed

  • ListView items disappearing while scrolling on iOS #23062
  • AndroidAttachDebugger=true causes app to crash, but AndroidAttachDebugger=false doesn't. #22979
  • DatePicker FontAttributes="Bold" and FontAttributes="Italic" Not Working on IOS or MacCatalyst #16272
  • Setting entry text from binding before user interaction sets null on iOS #22357
  • Memory leak with GraphicsView in windows #17214
  • Text inside ContentView doesn't update when using an async command on iOS #7281
  • [iOS] No Background is rendered on Borders with Shadows #7015
  • CollectionView does not highlight selected item on Android but works on windows #13885
  • [Android] If to set SystemUiVisibility = SystemUiFlags.HideNavigation on Android, then Flyout Items are not displayed. #8575
  • Label TextColor does not update on theme change when using FormattedText #16431
  • XamlC error XC0009 with CommunityToolkit.Maui.Popup with Dotnet 9 Preview 5 #23042
  • Severity Code Description Project File Line Suppression State Error #19649
  • remove_RequestedThemeChanged cause null reference #20551
  • TapGestureRecognizer popUpTapGesture = new TapGestureRecognizer(); not working #20007
  • ColectionView RemainingItemsThresholdReached is constatli coled #22101
  • CollectionView - ItemsUpdatingScrollMode="KeepScrollOffset" does not work in Windows #22162
  • Layout incorrect after visibility is toggled of a child view #22358
  • CollectionView SelectableItemsViewAdapter System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: ArgumentOutOfRange_IndexMustBeLess Arg_ParamName_Name, index #20764
  • .NET MAUI Problem with rendering RecyclerView.ViewHolder on Android #21895

PullRequests

Created

  • Add SR6 to issue template #23071
  • Make `MeasureInvalidated` event work correctly #23052
    community ✨
  • [iOS] TapGestureRecognizer should not fire when view is not enabled #23049

Updated

  • [Android] Entry & Picker VerticalTextAlignment ignored #21966
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry, area-controls-picker
  • [Docs] Added pending inline comments to Page class #20933
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Add TitleBar Control #23019
    platform/windows 🪟, .NET 9 Planning
  • WIP: HybridWebView control for integrating JS/HTML/CSS easily into a .NET MAUI app #22880
    do-not-merge, area-controls-hybridwebview, 9.0-preview6
  • [Android] Custom shell back button color #22940
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Move to 9.0.100.preview6 #23021
  • [Windows] Fix ListView insert not working properly #22746
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-listview
  • [XC] compile OnIdiom #21799
